======================================================================
Introduction
======================================================================

This archive contains the source code distributions, including any
source patches, for the third-party packages required to build
IceFIX.

This document provides instructions for applying patches and for
configuring the third-party packages.

For more information about the third-party dependencies, please refer
to the links below:

QuickFIX           http://www.quickfixengine.org/


======================================================================
Instructions
======================================================================

QuickFIX
----

Using your favorite Zip tool, unzip the QuickFIX source archive anywhere 
you like.

After extracting the QuickFIX source archive, refer to the file
INSTALL for build instructions.
